Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield City Council. Deals with adoption and fostering of children, adoption support, support to children and families subject to a residence or special guardianship order, private fostering and short breaks for children with disabilities. Foster placements can be short and long-term and support is given to the foster child, the child's family and to the foster carers. Welcomes enquiries from adults aged over 21 years who wish to adopt or foster. Runs a family placement scheme for children with disabilities.
